The Bella

What is the Bella?

  • Bellaing, or doing the Bella, is the act of a dog being upside down with a look on their face like they're having the time of their life
  • Named after Bella the golden retriever in this demonstrative video

  • It is important to note that a dog being upside down as a trick or for belly rubs is not a Bella
  • A true Bella is being done for its own sake or because the doggo is just a goofball

  • Some traits of Bellaing include:
  • Being completely adorable
  • Usually, but not always, done by goldens
  • Big upside-down smile on the good boy's/girl's face

Some more examples of Bellas
